abstract: The gum leaf war--Santa claws--Wunderpants--Lucky Lips.
description: The Twist family - 13-year-old twins Pete and Linda, their 8-year-old brother Bronson and their single Dad, Tony - move to an old lighthouse on the Australian coast. Here they encounter some unusual characters and strange happenings in a series of weird and comic adventures. Adapted for television from his own stories by the highly popular Australian children's author Paul Jennings, each episode is a self-contained story with a surprise ending, guaranteed to send you "round the twist".
